title: Black screen after login anyone?
body: I heard STK skins was out so naturally I login to my client. To my surprise, I was welcome with a black screen after successfully login. Anyone got the same problem? Any suggestion why?

replies.body: Black screens like this are usually due to a network issue that's unable to download assets.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this resolved.  This will fix you up so you can get your hands on those SKT skins!
